product_name: TYR Femme T-72 Goggles - Women's Petite
long_description: The TYR Femme T-72 goggles offer a comfortable, secure fit to swimmers with small faces. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Multi-position nosepiece system offers a perfect fit. Silicone gaskets seal out water for a comfortable fit that maintains its original shape swim after swim. Silicone strap conforms to sides of head, and flat back straps allow a secure fit; strap is easy to adjust.
short_description: The TYR Femme T-72 goggles offer a comfortable, secure fit to swimmers with small faces.
